item.title: Help with max level whereis it located what file
item.dc:creator: @Staccia Staccia
item.description:
@Staccia wrote:

search for: public int getXPForLevel(int level it will look like this: [code] public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + ###.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= level) {
			return output;
		}
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return ###;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + ###.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return ###;
}[/code] i beleive that 1st is combat, and second is lvl max. change the "###" to your max lvls.

Read full topic
